item.description: Boston Rotaract will be volunteering to serve food to some of the women at the Women’s Lunch Place. This event will be from 11am-3pm. The mission of the Women’s Lunch Place is to provide a safe, comfortable daytime shelter, nutritious food, and services for women who are homeless or poor. They treat women with dignity and respect and foster a community committed to meeting each woman's needs. If you’re interested, please sign-up here: http://goo.gl/N4O1J

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Women's Lunch Plate community service event
